comment: Main text block containing Chinese characters in seal script with annotations, arranged in vertical columns. The content appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or lexicon (possibly a section of the Shuowen Jiezi), detailing character forms, meanings, and phonetic readings. Each entry includes the character in seal script, its definition, pronunciation (via fanqie method), and etymological components (e.g., '从雨' meaning 'from rain radical').
